name: FishCake
description:
Made by Marc, Mathilda, Gaelle, Nathan and Connor in the EMMI game jam 2023.
 
To launch the game, make the right import for you IDE (pygame, math, random,pathlib and maybe some other) then run "src/Game.py".
Move your fish with the directional Arrows 
Aim and shot with your mouse.
Collect items that will make your stronger or sometimes change your environment.
 You win the game when you've become so powerful that the game crashes.
